<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/org/units/list"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This API endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of collections. The endpoint is paginated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"page":{"type":"integer","description":"The page number for pagination","default":0},"page_size":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of items per page (default may vary)"},"filter":{"type":"object","properties":{"ou_category_id":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Filter collections by category IDs"}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
